name: Kill to Save
description:
You discover yourself in a zombie apocalypse and very few humans remaining unaffected. You can't kill zombies as they are already dead. But zombies will regain their human form from time to time. Then You can kill them. When they are zombies they will try to attack and when humans they will try to steal your resources.  So it is up to you now to save rest of the humanity. So will you be bad by killing infected humans for the greater good?.......Let's find out!

Game Controls:

A/D/Left/Right arrow  - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Fire
